pm.name: Project Manager
pm.description: Creates initial project vision, business requirements, and project planning

architect.name: Architect
architect.description: Designs technical solution, architecture diagrams, and tech stack

spike.name: Spike Agent
spike.description: Researches technical unknowns and creates research documentation

em.name: Engineering Manager
em.description: Plans implementation, creates epics, and manages technical roadmap

release-manager.name: Release Manager
release-manager.description: Defines deployment strategy and manages release processes

git-handler.name: Git Handler
git-handler.description: Manages version control, branching, commits, and deployments

dev.name: Developer
dev.description: Implements features following architectural patterns and best practices

code-reviewer.name: Code Reviewer
code-reviewer.description: Ensures code quality, architectural compliance, and maintains standards

qa.name: QA Agent
qa.description: Validates functionality through comprehensive testing and automation

prompt-engineer.name: Prompt Engineer
prompt-engineer.description: Meta-agent for creating and maintaining other agent prompts
